CutSceneText.Text: How did you know I was here?
Someone gave me this letter and asked me to come and fetch you.
Hmm, this letter... It's barely legible. It's so dark.
Never mind. At long last, things are progressing in the Tower of Light.
Thank you. I couldn't stay hidden any longer...
There's a secret passage in the cellar.
You know Barat Pyega very well. Not many people know him.
I've only ever heard tell of him.
